titleStmt.title: The Sighs of France in slavery, breathing after liberty by way of memorial / done out of French.
Soupirs de la France esclave. Mémoires 1-2. English.
titleStmt.author: Jurieu, Pierre, 1637-1713.
Le Vassor, Michel, 1646-1718.

notesStmt.note: Translation of the first two "mémoires" of Les soupirs de la France esclave, qui aspire après la liberté, attributed to Pierre Jurieu and to Michel Le Vassor.
"Original French ed. published at Amsterdam, in 15 'mémoires,' Aug. 10, 1689 to Sept. 15, 1690"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
In 2 pts.; the 2nd pt. has special t.p. and continuous paging.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
